name: Old Whale Tale (demo)
description:
[INTRODUCTION]

Welcome to the demo for Old Whale Tale, a game of relaxing and escaping the world for a time. In this pixel RPG, you will play as an old retired fishing captain living in his small island home in the south pacific, surviving off the fish you catch and sell. Whether you go fishing on your boat, prepare meals from ingredients you collect, relax on your island, or seek the old tales of the fisherman's past, is up to you. 

[KICKSTARTER]

There's still time to help fund this game on Kickstarter! Campaign ends May 24, 2022

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/somecodeguy/old-whale-tale

[CONTROLS]

Z - Interact

X - Cancel

C - Open Menu

Arrow Keys - Walk

Left arrow key while fishing - Reel / Cast line

Up arrow key while fishing - Set hook
